Main.Title: Trove Search
Main.Description: This app searches Trove for additional information for BIB results shown on the screen.

Settings.Title: Settings
Settings.Description: This app requires an API key from Trove to function. If you don't have one, create an account at Trove and follow the instructions to get an API key.

Errors.InvalidInstitutionURL: Institution URL must begin with http:// or https://.
Errors.TroveUnavailableDescription:
There seems to be an issue attempting to search Trove.

It is possible that:

  1. You have not set a correct API key for Trove.
  2. Trove is down for the moment.

You can set or check you API key in
